summary: Universal Pictures, also known as Universal Studios, is an American movie company. It was started in 1912 by nine people and is now owned by Comcast. Universal is one of the oldest film studios, not just in the U.S. but worldwide. They've made many popular movies, like *Fast & Furious*, *Jurassic Park*, and *Despicable Me*. Some of their older films, such as *Jaws* and *E.T.*, were huge hits and became the top-earning movies of their time. Universal is part of a group called the "Big Five" major film studios.
title: Universal Pictures
